values.label: Additional identification
values.comment: Information which specifies and qualifies product identifications.

values.label: Identification for potential substitution
values.comment: The item number describes the potential substitute product.

values.label: Substituted by
values.comment: The given item number is the number of the product that substitutes another one.

values.label: Substituted for
values.comment: The given item number is the number of the original product substituted by another.

values.label: Product identification
values.comment: The item number is for product identification.

values.label: Successor product id
values.comment: Product id of the product that will follow the one currently in production/trade.

values.label: Predecessor product id
values.comment: Product id of the predecessor of the product currently in production/trade.

values.label: Expired/out of production
values.comment: The given item number is the expired item number of the product. It has been replaced.

values.label: Deletion of secondary identification
values.comment: Code indicating the deletion of a secondary identification.

values.label: Alternate product identification
values.comment: Alternate number to identify the product.

values.label: Non-promotional item
values.comment: Used to indicate which trade item the promotional trade item replaces or coexists alongside. To enable the identification of the two trade items to be linked providing access to their information.

values.label: Must buy product in multi-buy promotion
values.comment: A code identifying a product which must be bought in order to qualify for a multi-buy promotion.

values.label: Discount product in a multi-buy promotion
values.comment: A code identifying a product for which a discount is being offered in a multi-buy promotion.

values.label: Deletion of additional identification or identification for substitution
values.comment: Code indicating the deletion of an additional or substitute product identification.
